item.description:
We will be in the back room this time so look for us there -- I'll put a sign on the door.

The default plan is more interesting conversation over dinner/coffee. However, if any of you have a specific topic you'd like to discuss let me know and/or just bring it up.

Default location of Trident Cafe, 7:30 Aug 9. Please post or email if this date/time or venue don't work for you.
item.name: The Boston Transhumanism August Meetup
